definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: A group of people fro, amid is escorted Xu Shiyou team.
sentences.chinese: 山沟里走来一队人马，正是护送许世友的队伍。

sentences.english: And the white snow covered this valley of red huts.
sentences.chinese: 而且白雪覆盖了整个红房子的山沟时。

sentences.english: Located On Ravine Lot In Prestigious Joshua Creek.
sentences.chinese: 位于山沟地段在着名的约书亚河。

sentences.english: Tastefully Renovated Kitchen With Granite Counters & Eat-In Overlooking Lush Ravine.
sentences.chinese: 高雅的装修厨房花岗岩计数器和吃在俯瞰茂密的山沟。

sentences.english: Once the laborers died, their remains were thrown into mountain gullies or pits dug into bare hillsides .
sentences.chinese: 华工被迫害致死后，被扔进山沟或乱石坑。

sentences.english: The ravine flew out of sparrow finch.
They clambered up a narrow gully.
sentences.chinese: 他们爬上了一条狭窄的山沟。

sentences.english: I am really tired. I want to go back to my gully.
sentences.chinese: 我实在是太累了，我要回到原来的山沟沟去。

sentences.english: Why did you take me to this mountain gully ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么把我带到山沟里来了？

sentences.english: Big gold tooth shocked pole, this boy which come out in gully come of?
sentences.chinese: 大金牙吃惊极了，这小子哪山沟里冒出来的啊？

sentences.english: An hour later, he fell in the ravine of Ohain.
sentences.chinese: 一个钟点过后他倒在奥安的山沟里。

sentences.english: I bit my lip and charged through the gulley , without meeting any wolves.
sentences.chinese: 我咬着牙冲过山沟，没有遇到狼。

definition: road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
